ovdesc.p: IS.VEHICLE is the application to capture asset details of type Vehicle as per customer requirement.

desc.p: This field is used to input the ID of the Customer. Valid input from the CUSTOMER application
This field is used to input the CURRENCY in which Customer wants the Asset request Transaction to happen. Valid entry from the CURRENCY application.
This field is used to input the Vendor who delivers or produces the asset. Valid input from the related IS.VENDOR application.
This field is used to input the Unit Price of the Asset in Decimals.
This field refers to the Description of the Asset procured. Input should be in Alphanumeric.
This field refers to the Short Title of the Asset procured. Input should be in Alphanumeric.
This field refers to the Status of the Vehicle procured (Ex. Old or New).
This field refers to the Year of Manufacture of the Asset.
This field refers to the Engine Number of the Vehicle.
This field refers to the Chassis Number of the Vehicle.
This field refers to the Power of the Vehicle in Cubic Capacity.
This field refers to the seating capacity of the Vehicle in Numbers.
This field refers to the manufacturing company (Ex. FIAT,HONDA etc) of the Vehicle.
This field refers to the model of the vehicle which holds specific features into it.
This field refers to the Colour of the Vehicle.
This field refers to the usage of the Vehicle (Ex. Personal or Commercial).
This field refers to the Dealer Name of the Asset. Free text input.
This field refers to the Dealer Code of the Asset. Free text input.
This field refers to the number under which the vehicle is Registered.
This field specifies the place where the vehicle is registered.
This field specifies the Invoice Number of Bill produced by the Vendor.
This field refers to the date upto which the Registration is Valid.
This field refers to the Purchase Reference of the Asset. This field is automatically updated during authorisation of Purchase transaction. This is a Noinput field.
